IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: CHAMPLAIN HOUSING TRUST'S MISSION STATEMENT ASSERTS OUR PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE AS FOLLOWS: CHT IS A COMMUNITY LAND TRUST THAT SUPPORTS STRONG, VITAL COMMUNITIES IN NORTHWEST VERMONT THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND STEWARDSHIP OF PERMANENTLY AFFORDABLE HOMES AND ASSOCIATED COMMUNITY ASSETS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CHAMPLAIN HOUSING TRUST'S MISSION STATEMENT ASSERTS OUR PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE AS FOLLOWS: CHT IS A COMMUNITY LAND TRUST THAT SUPPORTS STRONG, VITAL COMMUNITIES IN NORTHWEST VERMONT THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND STEWARDSHIP OF PERMANENTLY AFFORDABLE HOMES AND ASSOCIATED COMMUNITY ASSETS.
IRS990.Description: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES LOW AND MODERATE INCOME HOUSING THROUGH SALES AND RENTALS.

Form990ScheduleCPartIV.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION SPENT $570 ON MAILINGS. THE ORGANIZATION PAID DUES OF $6300 TO THE VERMONT HOUSING & CONSERVATION COALITION, WHOSE PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO LOBBY FOR FUNDING FOR THE VERMONT HOUSING & CONSERVATION TRUST FUND.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the members include the board of directors.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the board of directors are elected by its members.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the board of directors vote to approve governing decisions.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the form 990 is reviewed by the finance committee and is given final approval after the board of directors approve the audit.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the conflict of interest policies are enforced by the board of directors.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the organization reviews compensation data of comparable organizations in the area.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: all organizing and operating documents are available to the public upon request.
